## Video Tutorial

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2m9RrS9BfNo >}}

#### In this tutorial

Add New York City boroughs and subway station shapefiles as layers to your QGIS project and explore the data that they contain using the Attribute Table and the Identify Features tool.
